Bug Fixes
We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features and improvements. Thanks for using the SONIC App!

- Added mobile payment instructions to show how to use mobile payment and which locations near you accept mobile payment
- Bug fixes

• Updated reward redemption prompt to prevent accidental reward redemptions
• Bug fixes

• Updated reward functionality and flow for easier redemption.
• Bug Fixes

We’ve rebuilt the SONIC Drive-In app from the ground up, with a fresh design and a ton of enhancements! If you already have an account, log in using your same email and password. Your MySONIC cards and rewards are still there, but with improvements that make it all easier to manage.

PAYMENT
Introducing the new SONIC Pay℠ – no more long code to remember. Now you check in to your SONIC Drive-In location using the stall number you are parked at, and your order and payment will sync with the app. At stores featuring our new menu board touch screens, you’ll see the screen welcome you back in a new way when you check in, and show you the status of your order as it is being prepared.

REWARDS
Rewards get an upgrade too! We’ve made it clearer when to redeem and made redemption more fun. Everyone needs a little celebration when you cash in those free tots.

MENU
You can now browse the SONIC Drive-In menu right in the app. Check out all your favorites and find new ones when we release new items. You can also look up the nutritional values and size options for each item.

LOCATIONS
Search for the SONIC Drive-In locations closest to you. We’ve also added store phone numbers and hours where available. Filtering by mobile payment, drive-thru, and Now Open coming soon.

This is just the beginning. Lots more coming to the SONIC Drive-In app this summer!

What’s New
• New gift card designs to buy for yourself or send as gifts.

What’s Fixed
• We’ve tweaked some things to make check in and payment faster and more reliable.
• American Express cards can again be successfully added to the app.
• If you don’t have a credit card on your account (just a gift card) and you don’t have enough on your card to pay for your full order, you can now opt to pay only the remainder of your card balance and not reload, or add a credit card to reload your card.
• Bug fixes.

• We made the SONIC app simpler to navigate. Just tap the familiar Red Button in the app to pay and tap your avatar to see your account info.
• You can now choose to get push notifications when new rewards become available or when they are about to expire. Go check out the Rewards section or visit your account settings to turn push notifications on to make sure you never miss a reward.
• Store hours now include drive-thru hours.
• Added copy to the payment check-in screen to clarify how to switch payment cards if you have more than one on your account.
• Our buttons are now as round and friendly as the wheels of our carhops’ roller skates.
• Improved payment and check-in to make things faster and more reliable for you.
Improvements to store location finder for SONIC Pay.

Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Getting things ready for the iPhone X.

Checking in to pay is now way faster.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.

• You can now pull down on most screens to close them instead of having to reach all the way up to that x. The struggle is real.
• Checking in to pay is now even faster. Don’t forget to add your photo to your profile to see your face on the menu screen when you check in to pay!
• Added a link to our FAQs in the support section of the app.
• Bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements to user onboarding.

We heard your feedback. You can now purchase, reload or send MySONIC gift cards for amounts as low as $5.
Accessibility improvements.

Design enhancements, bug fixes and Order Ahead updates.
Bug fixes and Order Ahead enhancements.

We've turned on Order Ahead for everyone!
- Order Ahead is available at select drive-ins around the country! New cities added every week.
- Browse a new menu that lets you customize and add products to your order.
- TIP: Hold down the Ice icon on a drink to find Easy Ice.
- Set a pick up time so you'll be first in line when you arrive. Or pick "ASAP" if you're close to the drive-in!
- Redeem your rewards in Order Ahead orders.
- When you arrive, check in with the app and your food will be delivered quickly!

If your local SONIC Drive-In doesn't have Order Ahead yet, they probably will soon! New stores added every week.

Also...
- We updated the location confirmation alert at check out, with a map to make sure you pick the right drive-in.
- Bug fixes and enhancements

You can now set Favorite Drive-Ins when you select a location using Order Ahead. Look for the heart next to each location in the list.
If you use a gift card to pay, you can now choose to reload the exact amount you need to pay for your order and empty your card balance instead of reloading $10.
We changed how we introduce new users to customization options. Tip: Hold down the Ice icon to select Easy Ice or Extra Ice.
